posts.post_title: 30 card lot for sale w/hofers SOLD
posts.post_content:
Thirty cards SOLD

Note - some raw, some graded, sorry I don’t have scans of the graded cards in their holders, but all slabs are in very nice condition. Also, the seller of the Abbaticchio and Leach cards told me they were trimmed when I bought them. I have no other specific knowledge of the other raw cards. Judge for yourself.

Payment via PayPal 


See the lot at [url]www.imageevent.com/drumback/T206lotforsale[/url]
